entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Superior Provincial Park 08:00 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023
Temperature: -13.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -15.3°C
Wind: NNE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 05:50 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:50 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:50 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023
